title: Bai De Lie Yu Hao Pengyou
synopsis: Welcome to Patrei and good friends, here to provide novel worlds and great educational toys for children and young people and those who love life. Patrick and his good friends are well-known brands under Qizhiqisi. Here are 7 popular characters-Patrick, Xiaoying, Xiaoyao, Sam, Bobby, Ai Fan and Mimi. They teach children love and life, knowledge and popular science in the cartoon. I hope these characters can become friends of children and grow with them every step of the way. (translated from youku)
